unnormalised: Campus hiring remains crucial. Our drive at IIT Delhi and BITS Pilani yielded promising candidates. Dr. Sharma highlighted the Rs. 5 LPA starting salaries. We require individuals ready to relocate beyond Bangalore to smaller offices (500 sq ft). Interviews wrap up by 2024-07-15. Looking forward to onboarding these bright minds for Diwali!
normalised: Campus hiring remains crucial. Our drive at I I T Delhi and B I T S Pilani yielded promising candidates. Doctor Sharma highlighted the rupee five L P A starting salaries.
